thread.title: Power-play goals cause Admirals to lose opener
thread.title_full: Power-play goals cause Admirals to lose opener

title: Power-play goals cause Admirals to lose opener
text:
— 5 
First period — 1, CHI, Paajarvi (Benoit, Harrold), 5:48 (PP); 2, MIL, Kamenev, 9:04 (SH); 3, CHI, Cannone (Paajarvi, Rattie), 12:50 (PP); 4, CHI, Rattie (O'Brien, Butler), 16:08 (PP). Penalties — MIL, Nakyva (tripping), 4:48; MIL, Diaby (roughing), 7:12; MIL, Diaby (misconduct-continuing altercation), 7:12; MIL, Sissons (roughing), 7:12; CHI, Beach (roughing), 7:12; MIL, Aberg (slashing), 11:45; MIL, Girard (delay of game), 12:00; MIL, Murphy (hooking), 15:34; MIL, Bass (fighting), 18:25; CHI, Doty (fighting), 18:25. 
Second period — 5, CHI, Rattie (Benoit), 6:28; 6, CHI, Doty (Benoit, Barbashev), 19:59. Penalties — MIL, Kamenev (tripping), 5:28; CHI, Beach (boarding), 6:58. 
Third period — No scoring. Penalties — CHI, Vannelli (cross-checking), 5:30; MIL, Fiala (tripping), 10:07; CHI, Caron (hooking), 18:37. 
SAVES
